data.description:
White girls with developed posteriors.


𝗥𝗨𝗟𝗘𝗦


● White women only.

● Phat asses only! Phat asses have not only size, but shape/definition.

● No Underage (18+ only).

● No full videos. Only images and gifs (Short videos allowed. They should be 1 minute long minimum). 

● No photoshops.

● No reposts (No reposting of any image/gif/video that has been posted recent).

● No low quality images/gifs/videos (Images/gifs/videos should not be blurry/potato quality. Screenshots also count as low quality).

● Images, GIFs, and videos must be direct links.

● No text posts.

● No hentai / cartoons.

● Include source, model name or [OC] tag if applicable.

● Follow all Ruqqus rules.

● Keep it civil and on topic.


𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗦 𝗢𝗙 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗚𝗨𝗜𝗟𝗗

+stripgirls

+Bimbos

+WrestleWithThePlot

+Upskirt

+CartoonPorn

data.description:
WELCOME TO SAM AND TOLKI. The Largest and most active Showvideogames fan site.

Sam and Tolki are a married couple who run the popular twitch stream ShowVideoGames. They became most famous for their long marathons and interaction with their viewers. During the height of their popularity, Sam and Tolki went to a speedrunning event called SGDQ in the summer of 2014 and Tolki ended up having an affair with a popular speedrunner named Stivitybobo and another streamer named GiantWaffle. Afterwards, both Sam and Tolki disappeared without a trace for years, finally in the summer of 2016 they resurfaced two years later. But the Showvideogames channel had fallen into ruin and they were not able to regain the massive popularity they once had.

This guild is now a place for all types of discussion relating to Internet celebrity relationship drama and gossip. You wont be censored for having any unpopular or offensive opinions.

Official Discord
https://discord.gg/HU9Uyhg
data.description_html:

During the height of their popularity, Sam and Tolki went to a speedrunning event called SGDQ in the summer of 2014 and Tolki ended up having an affair with a popular speedrunner named Stivitybobo and another streamer named GiantWaffle. data.description:
# Description

* Imagine if +Animemes and +HistoryMemes did a fusion dance, and out came this guild

## Rules

* NSFW Posts must be **clearly marked**

* Explicit content and NSFL content is **banned**

* All memes must be **Animemes**

* All memes must be related to **History** and **historical events**

#### Related Guilds

* [List of all Anime Related Guilds](https://ruqq.us/2l1d)

* +Animemes

* +HistoryMemes

![](https://i.imgur.com/8OZx7WC.png)

*Guild banner and sidebar images made by @Zhinakin*

data.description:
Realism about the different groups in the world, but positivity about them none-the-less. 

This guild is about promoting positivity within the right-wing sphere. That means not disparaging any groups, and celebrating when they do good. If you want more political positivity on Ruqqus, without statistical reality denial(we don't discuss negative stats here), this is the guild for you!

Other positive political guilds:
- +Conservative
- +Equalism (convservative)
- +radicalcentrism
- +OpenLeft (center left)

data.description:
Are you an old guildmaster looking to give a guild new owners? Are you prospective new guildmasters looking for new guilds to adopt? Or perhaps you have a siege ready and are looking to adopt an already existing guild rather than make your own? 

+GuildAdoption is here to help you find the perfect guild for your needs.

Please only submit your listing once every few days. 

Guild Requests should be directed to +requestaguild.
